Academy owned devices will be distributed according to the following tiers:

Tier 1: Families that qualify for Educational Benefits (free or reduced lunch)
Tier 2: Families that have 3 or more children attending Eagle Ridge Academy
Tier 3: On an as is available basis

Please complete one device request form for each student requesting an Academy owned device. To ensure that we have a device available for you at the start of the school year, please complete this form by August 17, 2020.

What is a growth mindset? "It describes people who believe that their success depends on time and effort. People with a growth mindset feel their skills and intelligence can be improved with effort and persistence. They embrace challenges, persist through obstacles, learn from criticism and seek out inspiration in others‚Äô success.‚Äù

Here are a handful of growth mindset illustrations to lift spirits. If our 6th graders can look on the positive side of life, can't we all?
